mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(company_id, notice_title, notice_coname, notice_image, notice_period, notice_dept, notice_position, notice_task, notice_sal, notice_qual, notice_career, notice_wellfare, job_id) VALUES(#{companyId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeConame},#{noticeImage}, #{noticePeriod},#{noticeDept},#{noticePosition},#{noticeTask},#{noticeSal},#{noticeQual},#{noticeCareer}, #{noticeWellfare},#{jobId})
